title: Who made Kai'Sa's theme?
body: I love it. Reminds me of Metroid. I love each transition in the song. First part is action, second is more frantic, and the last part sounds like Kai'Sa is at peace.

replies.body: Nice!! The composer on that actually is a HUGE Metroid fan and is one of his favorite games. :D I don't think he posts much on these boards but it was ShreddyMercury!
Give that man an award for best name ever.

Says Poolparty Sauron!


Ahahaha amazing! this post made my day! but jokes aside i don't think i ever seen ShreddyMercury around the board! hope they know how much we like the theme!
Does EdtheConqueror still works with you guys?
